channel.title: I'm new to simba, is there a way to detect NPC ids and load rsps client with
channel.description: Is there a way to detect npc ids for rsps ect. And load the jar with it somehow, maybe stupid question. Never used this in my life

item.title: I'm new to simba, is there a way to detect NPC ids and load rsps client with
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

Echo_:

[quote author=BenLand100]SMART can actually run other java applets, but there is no denying that it has a special emphasis on runescape

So by using SMART along with the hook required to reflect NPC ids (its in NPCDef iirc), you can detect an NPC’s id. You will have to modify some things to make it work though, so it won’t be easy.[/quote]

Is there any tut for to load a jar or so in it?

Read full topic
item.source: I'm new to simba, is there a way to detect NPC ids and load rsps client with

item.title: I'm new to simba, is there a way to detect NPC ids and load rsps client with
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

BenLand100:

SMART can actually run other java applets, but there is no denying that it has a special emphasis on runescape

So by using SMART along with the hook required to reflect NPC ids (its in NPCDef iirc), you can detect an NPC’s id. You will have to modify some things to make it work though, so it won’t be easy.

Read full topic
